response.overview: Kusum Tumi Amar is a 2009 Bengali period-drama movie starring Chiranjeet, Gargi Roychowdhury, Geeta Dey, and Kumar Jeet. Set in pre-independent India, the film revolves around a rich merchant who secretly funds freedom fighters while maintaining a cordial relationship with the British. Will his secret endanger his life, or will he continue to support the cause of India's independence?
response.title: Kusum Tumi Amar
